xmlText.p: First Period_1, Tampa Bay, Stamkos 22 (Kucherov, Hedman), 3:55. 2, Tampa Bay, Kucherov 31 (Hedman, Namestnikov), 7:05 (pp). Penalties_Stamkos, TB, (high sticking), 1:25; Mantha, DET, (holding), 5:58; Coburn, TB, (tripping), 18:43.

Second Period_3, Tampa Bay, Stamkos 23 (Kucherov, Hedman), 18:08 (pp). 4, Detroit, Tatar 15 (Bertuzzi, Kronwall), 19:29 (pp). Penalties_DeKeyser, DET, (holding), 13:23; Mantha, DET, (interference), 16:43; Namestnikov, TB, (slashing), 18:36.
Third Period_5, Tampa Bay, Killorn 11 (Kucherov, Point), 1:35. Penalties_Nielsen, DET, (cross checking), 19:32.
Power-play opportunities_Detroit 1 of 3; Tampa Bay 2 of 4.
Goalies_Detroit, Howard 16-18-6 (32 shots-28 saves). Tampa Bay, Vasilevskiy 34-11-2 (39-38).
Referees_Frederick L'Ecuyer, Brad Watson. Linesmen_Brad Kovachik, Brian Murphy.
